title: Allergy Basics
cleaned_text: Allergy Basics Dr. Karen DeMuth discusses seasonal allergies, common allergy triggers , coping methods, treatments and common allergy myths. DeMuth is Assistant Professor of Pediatrics at the Emory University School of Medicine, Emory University. She is also a pediatric allergy specialist at Emory-Children's Center.
